scripts.start: docker-compose up -d db && sleep 15 && docker-compose up -d api
scripts.api:start:test: yarn db:reset && yarn db:load:test && yarn api:start:dev
scripts.db:shell: docker-compose up -d db_shell && docker attach bb_data_services_db_shell_1
scripts.db:load:example: docker-compose up -d db_shell && docker-compose exec db_shell execute example
scripts.db:load:test: docker-compose up -d db_shell && docker-compose exec db_shell execute test_data
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose up -d db_shell && docker-compose exec db_shell execute delete_all
scripts.db:reset:deep: docker-compose down && docker volume rm bb_data_services_store
